Class DataBaseHandler

java.lang.Object
utilities.DataBaseHandler
public class DataBaseHandler extends Object
The DataBaseHandler class manages the connection to the database and provides methods to interact with the employee records. It allows for querying employee details, displaying employee summaries, and reporting the number of employees in each role.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DataBaseHandler()
    Constructs a new DataBaseHandler instance and establishes a connection to the database.

  • Constructor Details

    • DataBaseHandler

      public DataBaseHandler()
      Constructs a new DataBaseHandler instance and establishes a connection to the database. If the connection fails, an error message is displayed.

  • Method Details

    • DispAllEmployee

      public void DispAllEmployee()
      Displays all employee records from the database, including employee details like ID, username, role, name, phone number, date of birth, start date, and email. It also shows a summary of employees by role and the total number of employees.

    • DispEmployeeWithRole

      public void DispEmployeeWithRole(String role)
      Displays the details of all employees with a specified role. The details include employee ID, username, role, name, phone number, date of birth, start date, and email. The results are displayed in a formatted table.
      Parameters:
      role - the role of the employees to retrieve (e.g., "Manager", "RegularEmployee")

    • DispEmployeeWithUsername

      public void DispEmployeeWithUsername(String username)
      Displays the details of an employee with a specified username. The details include employee ID, username, role, name, phone number, date of birth, start date, and email. If no such user exists, a message is displayed.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the employee to retrieve

    • UpdateEmployeeNPF

      public void UpdateEmployeeNPF(char choice, Employee tempEmployee, InputHandler inputHandler)
      Updates the details of an employee based on the provided choice. It allows updating various employee attributes such as username, role, name, surname, date of birth, and date of start.
      Parameters:
      choice - The character representing the field to be updated. '1' for username, '2' for role, '3' for name, '4' for surname, '5' for date of birth, '6' for date of start.
      tempEmployee - The Employee object whose details are being updated.
      inputHandler - The InputHandler object that provides methods to receive user input.

    • HireEmployee

      public void HireEmployee(String username, String name, String surname, String role, LocalDate dob, LocalDate dos)
      Adds a new employee to the database. The employee's details such as username, name, surname, role, date of birth, and date of start are inserted into the employees table. The password is automatically generated as "Khas" + username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the new employee.
      name - The name of the new employee.
      surname - The surname of the new employee.
      role - The role of the new employee (e.g., "Manager" or "Regular").
      dob - The date of birth of the new employee.
      dos - The date of start of the new employee.

    • FireEmployee

      public void FireEmployee(String username)
      Removes an employee from the database based on the provided username. The employee's record will be deleted from the employees table.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the employee to be removed.

    • GetEmployeeWithUsername

      public Employee GetEmployeeWithUsername(String username)
      Retrieves an employee's details from the database based on the provided username. The method constructs an Employee object based on the data from the database.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the employee to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Employee object containing the employee's details, or null if the employee is not found.

    • GetEmployeeWithUsernameAndPassword

      public Employee GetEmployeeWithUsernameAndPassword(String username, String password)
      Retrieves an employee's details from the database based on the provided username and password. The method constructs an Employee object based on the data from the database.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the employee to retrieve.
      password - The password of the employee for authentication.
      Returns:
      The Employee object containing the employee's details, or null if the employee is not found or the password is incorrect.

    • CheckDuplicate

      public <T> boolean CheckDuplicate(String field, T value)
      Checks if a given field contains a duplicate value in the database.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the value (can be String, Integer, etc.).
      Parameters:
      field - The field in the database to check for duplicates (e.g., "email", "phone_no").
      value - The value to check for duplication in the specified field.
      Returns:
      true if the value exists in the specified field in the database; false otherwise.

    • PrintProfile

      public void PrintProfile(String username)
      Prints the profile of an employee based on their username. This includes employee details like ID, username, role, name, surname, phone number, date of birth, date of start, and email.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the employee whose profile will be printed.

    • UpdatePhone

      public void UpdatePhone(int employee_id, String phone)
      Updates the phone number of an employee in the database based on their employee ID. If the update is successful, a success message is printed.
      Parameters:
      employee_id - The ID of the employee whose phone number needs to be updated.
      phone - The new phone number to be set for the employee.

    • UpdatePassword

      public void UpdatePassword(int employee_id, String password)
      Updates the password of an employee in the database based on their employee ID. If the update is successful, a success message is printed.
      Parameters:
      employee_id - The ID of the employee whose password needs to be updated.
      password - The new password to be set for the employee.

    • UpdateEmail

      public void UpdateEmail(int employee_id, String email)
      Updates the email address of an employee in the database based on their employee ID. If the update is successful, a success message is printed.
      Parameters:
      employee_id - The ID of the employee whose email needs to be updated.
      email - The new email address to be set for the employee.
